attractions.name: Golconda Fort
attractions.description: Stay for sunset and take a guided tour for the history

attractions.name: Charminar
attractions.description: Very crowded, be prepared. Good place to shop for bangles, pearls and other trinkets. See the monument and eat biryani at Shadab. Also check out the walking tour

attractions.name: Shilparamam
attractions.description: Model of a traditional village. Lots of handicraft stores. Cultural events happen

hotels.note: These are some suggestions, but in general look for hotels in Banjara Hills, Jubilee Hills or Madhapur.

recommendations.name: Zostel Hyderabad
recommendations.description: This one is a hostel, but if you want to meet some other people, it's a good option
